unnormalised: For a perfect fit, remember to take measurements in cm and inches, especially when working with fabrics that might shrink after the 1st wash; also, note down measurements like bust 36", waist 30", and length 40" for future reference.
normalised: For a perfect fit, remember to take measurements in centimeter and inches, especially when working with fabrics that might shrink after the first wash; also, note down measurements like bust thirty six inches, waist thirty inches, and length forty inches for future reference.
